welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Evergreen Park, USA! Get ready to experience the charming small-town atmosphere and explore our beautiful parks and trails. We hope you have a delightful stay here and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for Delta Airlines and AirTran Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for Volaris and Porter Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is the central hub for all flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
